'''Dendroculus Resonance Stone''' is a consumable [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[Dendroculus|Dendroculi]]. It can be created through [[alchemy]] after using the [[Instructions: Dendroculus Resonance Stone|instructions]] obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 8 in [[Sumeru]].
